articles.author: Alex Bozich
articles.title: Five takeaways from Indiana's win over Maryland - Inside the Hall
articles.description: Indiana snapped a five-game losing streak with a 74-64 win over Maryland on Thursday night at Simon Skjodt Assembly Hall.
articles.content:
Indiana snapped a five-game losing streak with a 74-64 win over Maryland on Thursday night at Simon Skjodt Assembly Hall. The win improved the Hoosiers to 17-10 overall and 8-9 in Big Ten play.
